title: Oresama Gattai Keikaku
sinopse:
My senpai is super-hot, super-popular, and a super-model. Rumor has it that he always invites his target to the library and ravishes that person right there and then…
Which is why I was totally shocked when he suddenly asked me to join him at the library!?— I’m ecstatic!!!
My body is already burning in anticipation—!

Written under the name Kaou, Saeko.

(Source: Fantasyshrine)
